'post' header italic angle is: '-6.0'.

Info

-/-

It seems to be not bold.
OS2.fsSelection.bold: False
head.macStyle.bold: False

Zilla Slab Bold Italic (ZillaSlab-BoldItalic.ttf)

OS/2, usWeightClass

MS NID 2

usWeightClass should be 700 if MS ID 2 is 'Bold'.

ID 2 is 'Bold Italic'
usWeightClass is '700'.
Everything is good.

Pass

Zilla Slab Bold Italic (ZillaSlab-BoldItalic.ttf)

name, Bold Italic

MS NID 2

MS ID 2 should be 'Bold Italic' and OS2.fsSelection.bold = True and head.macStyle.bold = True and OS2.fsSelection.regular = False.

ID 2 is 'Bold Italic'
OS2.fsSelection.bold is 'True'
head.macStyle.bold is 'True'
OS2.fsSelection.regular is 'False'

Advance width

Advance width of hmtx and CFF table should be the same (tolerance 2 units).

This is a TrueType font. This test is only for CFF.

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

cmap

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Missing Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table. Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

hmtx

Index 834 and 835

OK: Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) does match the space (uni0020) width:
238 = 238

Warning

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

hmtx

Index 834 and 838

Advance width of 'thinspace' (uni2009) should be smaller than the advance width of 'space' (uni0020).

Advance width 'thinspace' 160 is smaller than 'space' 238, but should be 60% of space '142.79999999999998'. Please verify if this is intend to be like it is.

Warning

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

hmtx

Index 834 and 839

Advance width of 'hairspace' (uni200A) should be smaller than the advance width of 'space' (uni0020).

Advance width 'hairspace' 80 is smaller than 'space' 238, but should be 30% of space '71.39999999999999'. Please verify if this is intend to be like it is.

Pass

Error

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

glyf

Contours

.notdef should be TOFU.

Not Monotype standard TOFU. .notdef has 42 contours. It looks like it is not a TOFU. Please investigate.

Pass

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

Advance

ZERO WIDTH SPACE advance width should be 0

Advance width is '0'

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Warning

cmap

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Missing Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table. Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Pass

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

hmtx

Index 1 and 1053

Advance width of nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) should match the space (uni0020) width.

OK: Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) does match the space (uni0020) width:
220 = 220

Warning

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

hmtx

Index 1 and 1048

Advance width of 'thinspace' (uni2009) should be smaller than the advance width of 'space' (uni0020).

Advance width 'thinspace' 157 is smaller than 'space' 220, but should be 60% of space '132.0'. Please verify if this is intend to be like it is.

Warning

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

hmtx

Index 1 and 1047

Advance width of 'hairspace' (uni200A) should be smaller than the advance width of 'space' (uni0020).

Advance width 'hairspace' 78 is smaller than 'space' 220, but should be 30% of space '66.0'. Please verify if this is intend to be like it is.

Error

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

cmap

uni2008

Advance width of 'PUNCTUATION SPACE' (uni2008) should be equal to the 'period' advance width.

Can not check, because no uni2008 in this font.

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Info

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

Zilla Slab Bold Italic (ZillaSlab-BoldItalic.ttf)

glyf

-/-

Glyphs (VIETNAMESE) which chould be made from components (in many cases).
Please investigate and approve if correct.

'uni1EBC' (uni1EBC) (ID 93)

OS/2 table

OS/2 table

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Error

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

OS/2

WWS

If no NID 21 and 22, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True but is False.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

OS/2

usDefaultChar

'OS/2' usDefaultChar should be 0x0000.

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

OS/2

usFirstCharIndex

'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex should be 0x0000

OK: 'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex is 0x0000.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

OS/2

usLastCharIndex

'OS/2' usLastCharIndex should be 0xFB04

OK: 'OS/2' usLastCharIndex is 0xFB04.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Preview & Print Embedding'.

Info

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

OS/2

fsType

Pull 'OS/2' fsType.

embedding level: Embedding Level = Preview & Print Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Error

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

OS/2

WWS

If no NID 21 and 22, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True but is False.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is True and 'head' macStyle italic flag is True.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

OS/2

usDefaultChar

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

OS/2

usFirstCharIndex

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

OS/2

usLastCharIndex

OK: 'OS/2' usLastCharIndex is 0xFB04.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Preview & Print Embedding'.

Info

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

OS/2

fsType

Pull 'OS/2' fsType.

no subsetting flag: False

Pass

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Error

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

OS/2

WWS

If no NID 21 and 22, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True but is False.

Pass

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

fvar table

fvar table

Info

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

This font is not a variable font.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

static font

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap Table

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap Table

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

cmap

cmap(0, 3, 0)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

cmap(0, 3, 0) contains U+0000

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

cmap

cmap(0, 3, 0)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

cmap(0, 3, 0) contains U+000D

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

cmap

cmap(3, 1, 0)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

cmap(3, 1, 0) contains U+0000

Pass

Error

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017, The Mozilla Foundation'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '16'
'Zilla Slab Light'

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

Name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '15'
'ZillaSlab-Light'

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Zilla is a trademark of The Mozilla Corporation'
but what do think about this
'Zilla is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Typotheque type foundry', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Zilla Slab' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Zilla Slab Light'.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Version 1.1; 2017; ttfautohint (v1.6)'

Error

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017, The Mozilla Foundation'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '21'
'ZillaSlab-LightItalic'

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Zilla is a trademark of The Mozilla Corporation'
but what do think about this
'Zilla is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Typotheque type foundry', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Typotheque type foundry' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Open Font License, version 1.1 or later.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Zilla Slab' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light Italic' = NID 1 'Zilla Slab Light' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

Pass

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'ZillaSlab-Regular'

Pass

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

name

MS NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Zilla is a trademark of The Mozilla Corporation'
but what do think about this
'Zilla is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Typotheque type foundry', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Typotheque type foundry' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Open Font License, version 1.1 or later.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Zilla Slab Regular (ZillaSlab-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Copyright 2017, The Mozilla Foundation'

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-Italic', Everything looks good.

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Zilla is a trademark of The Mozilla Corporation'
but what do think about this
'Zilla is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Typotheque type foundry', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Typotheque type foundry' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Open Font License, version 1.1 or later.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab Italic (ZillaSlab-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Copyright 2017, The Mozilla Foundation'

Error

Zilla Slab Medium Regular (ZillaSlab-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017, The Mozilla Foundation'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Zilla Slab Medium'

Zilla Slab Medium Regular (ZillaSlab-Medium.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

Name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Name table version entry 'Version 1.1; 2017; ttfautohint (v1.6)' does not match fontRevision 'Version 1.002'.

Pass

Zilla Slab Medium Regular (ZillaSlab-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '16'
'ZillaSlab-Medium'

Pass

Zilla Slab Medium Regular (ZillaSlab-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-Medium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab Medium Regular (ZillaSlab-Medium.ttf)

name

'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-Medium', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Typotheque type foundry' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Open Font License, version 1.1 or later.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Zilla Slab Medium Regular (ZillaSlab-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Zilla Slab Medium Regular (ZillaSlab-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Zilla Slab' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Medium' = NID 1 'Zilla Slab Medium'.

Pass

Zilla Slab Medium Regular (ZillaSlab-Medium.ttf)

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'ZillaSlab-Medium'

Error

Zilla Slab Medium Italic (ZillaSlab-MediumItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017, The Mozilla Foundation'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Zilla Slab Medium Italic (ZillaSlab-MediumItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '22'
'ZillaSlab-MediumItalic'

Pass

Zilla Slab Medium Italic (ZillaSlab-MediumItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-MediumItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab Medium Italic (ZillaSlab-MediumItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-MediumItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab Medium Italic (ZillaSlab-MediumItalic.ttf)

Zilla Slab Medium Italic (ZillaSlab-MediumItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Zilla is a trademark of The Mozilla Corporation'
but what do think about this
'Zilla is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Zilla Slab Medium Italic (ZillaSlab-MediumItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Typotheque type foundry', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Zilla Slab Medium Italic (ZillaSlab-MediumItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab Medium Italic (ZillaSlab-MediumItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab Medium Italic (ZillaSlab-MediumItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Typotheque type foundry' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Open Font License, version 1.1 or later.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Zilla Slab Medium Italic (ZillaSlab-MediumItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Zilla Slab Medium Italic (ZillaSlab-MediumItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Zilla Slab Medium Italic (ZillaSlab-MediumItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Zilla Slab' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Medium Italic' = NID 1 'Zilla Slab Medium' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017, The Mozilla Foundation'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Zilla Slab SemiBold Regular (ZillaSlab-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '18'
'ZillaSlab-SemiBold'

Pass

Zilla Slab SemiBold Regular (ZillaSlab-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab SemiBold Regular (ZillaSlab-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab SemiBold Regular (ZillaSlab-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Zilla is a trademark of The Mozilla Corporation'
but what do think about this
'Zilla is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Zilla Slab SemiBold Regular (ZillaSlab-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Typotheque type foundry', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Zilla Slab SemiBold Regular (ZillaSlab-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab SemiBold Regular (ZillaSlab-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab SemiBold Regular (ZillaSlab-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Typotheque type foundry' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Open Font License, version 1.1 or later.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Zilla Slab SemiBold Regular (ZillaSlab-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Zilla Slab SemiBold Regular (ZillaSlab-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Zilla Slab SemiBold Regular (ZillaSlab-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Zilla Slab' + 'Space' + NID 17 'SemiBold' = NID 1 'Zilla Slab SemiBold'.

Pass

name

MS NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic (ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic' = NID 1 'Zilla Slab SemiBold' + 'space' + NID 2 'Italic'

Pass

Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic (ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

Name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Name table version entry 'Version 1.1; 2017; ttfautohint (v1.6)' does not match fontRevision 'Version 1.002'.

Pass

Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic (ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '24'
'ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic'

Pass

Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic (ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic (ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic (ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic (ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Zilla is a trademark of The Mozilla Corporation'
but what do think about this
'Zilla is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic (ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Typotheque type foundry', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic (ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic (ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic (ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Typotheque type foundry' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Open Font License, version 1.1 or later.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic (ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic (ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic (ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Zilla Slab' + 'Space' + NID 17 'SemiBold Italic' = NID 1 'Zilla Slab SemiBold' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Zilla Slab SemiBold Italic (ZillaSlab-SemiBoldItalic.ttf)

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Copyright 2017, The Mozilla Foundation'

Zilla Slab Bold (ZillaSlab-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017, The Mozilla Foundation'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Width Names Full Font Name NID4

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Zilla Slab Bold'

Error

Zilla Slab Bold (ZillaSlab-Bold.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

Name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Name table version entry 'Version 1.1; 2017; ttfautohint (v1.6)' does not match fontRevision 'Version 1.002'.

Pass

Zilla Slab Bold (ZillaSlab-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '14'
'ZillaSlab-Bold'

Pass

Zilla Slab Bold (ZillaSlab-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab Bold (ZillaSlab-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ZillaSlab-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Zilla Slab Bold (ZillaSlab-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Zilla Slab Bold (ZillaSlab-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Zilla Slab Bold (ZillaSlab-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Zilla Slab Bold (ZillaSlab-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Zilla is a trademark of The Mozilla Corporation'
but what do think about this
'Zilla is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Zilla Slab Bold (ZillaSlab-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Typotheque type foundry', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Zilla Slab Bold (ZillaSlab-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab Bold (ZillaSlab-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.typotheque.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab Bold (ZillaSlab-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Typotheque type foundry' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Open Font License, version 1.1 or later.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Zilla Slab Bold (ZillaSlab-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Zilla Slab Bold (ZillaSlab-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Copyright 2017, The Mozilla Foundation'

Zilla Slab Bold Italic (ZillaSlab-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017, The Mozilla Foundation'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'http://www.typotheque.com'

Error

Zilla Slab Bold Italic (ZillaSlab-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 12

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'http://www.typotheque.com'

Error

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-75'.
underlineThicknes is '50'.

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Info

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Info

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

kern/GPOS

kern

'kern' table and 'GPOS' kerning.

Font has GPOS kerning and no 'kern' table.
Verify with the spec or PM what is required.

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1000) match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (1000).

Vertical Metrics 'descent' should be negative.

descent = '-256'.

gasp Table

gasp Table

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

gasp

Version

gasp table verison should be 1.

Verison = 1

Info

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Zilla Slab Medium Regular (ZillaSlab-Medium.ttf)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Zilla Slab Medium Regular (ZillaSlab-Medium.ttf)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Zilla Slab Medium Italic (ZillaSlab-MediumItalic.ttf)

gasp

Version

gasp table verison should be 1.

Verison = 1

Info

PostScript names

PostScript names

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Regular (ZillaSlab-Light.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Zilla Slab Light Italic (ZillaSlab-LightItalic.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Every PostScript name is fine.
